official_title: A bill to terminate the authorization for the Trexler Dam and Lake Project as part of the Delaware River Basin project.

summary.text: Terminates the authorization for the Trexler Dam and Lake project, Pennsylvania, as a part of the Delaware River Basin project.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authorization for the Trexler Dam and Lake Project as part of the Delaware River Basin project.
